Package org.macroing.gdt.openrc.geometry

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CameraPredicate  
    Light
    The values in the float array created by the toFloatArray() method consists of the following: Type Size Data[Size - 2]
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Camera
    The values in the float array array consists of the following: Eye X Eye Y Eye Z Up X Up Y Up Z Look-at X Look-at Y Look-at Z OrthoNormalBasis-U X OrthoNormalBasis-U Y OrthoNormalBasis-U Z OrthoNormalBasis-V X OrthoNormalBasis-V Y OrthoNormalBasis-V Z OrthoNormalBasis-W X OrthoNormalBasis-W Y OrthoNormalBasis-W Z View-plane distance Zoom
    Intersection
    The values in the float array created by the create(int) method consists of the following: Shape offset Shape distance (T)
